body:
After a bunch of time trying to reproduce this and reading the code again, it looks like this was fixed via https://github.com/golang/net/commit/3797cd8864994d713d909eda5e61ede8683fdc12 which was 9 days before this bug report, but that commit wasn't bundled into std until 66b47431cba75ce23630e17c1a3aa000e7b33d06, two days after this bug report.

So all good. (famous last words)
